page.title: 07HOUSES_Where we live.
page.content: {Nina Hall Age 10 } There are all sorts of different types of{houses}like semi_detatched,terraced detatched and cottages.My{house}is a semi_detatched and it is made out of bricks.It was made in 1937.It has got pebble dashing only on some parts of my{house.}The front,back and side are painted red and white.The roof of my own{house}is made of tiles or slates. My roof is also sloped and does not have a window in it.There has been tiles,cement,bricks, glass,wood,stones or pebbles which were used to make up my{house.}The frames are made of wood. The pavement is made of cement and slabs.My parents do not know the builder. I live at 22 Greens Road in Keresley Coventry.I leave home to go to school at about 8.45am. It takes me one minute to get to school.
